name: Escape From Hell (RedneckChan)
description:
This is prototype of Top-Down Survival-horror, made for Ludum Dare 48.

You always can DOWNLOAD LATEST VERSION from Google Drive

Controlls:
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse Button - Fire

Native resolution - 1920x1080
if your display has different resolution, you may encounter ui bugs
